Pre-Game Insights: England has a strong historical record against Greece, with nine previous encounters resulting in seven wins and two draws.
The match is significant for England as it aims to regain their position in the Nations League A.
Greece will use a disciplined defensive approach despite their lower FIFA ranking.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be broadcast live on ITV1 and via the ITVX app in the UK.
Dominic Solanke has been recalled after seven years, while several injuries have forced England to make adjustments.
